name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: I'm Going to Teach Konohamaru Kempo/ I Save My Lucky Undies for Physicals
short_description: Konohamaru usually practices ninjutsu with Naruto. But now he's sought out Rock Lee to learn better hand-to-hand combat skills. Later, Lee and the others are ordered to undergo a routine physical exam.
